name: Growing Season Eatery, The
text:
The Growing Season
Juice Collective
Our Local Suppliers:
Kronos Cafe, International House of Tea, Thunder Oak Cheese Farm,
Borealis Breads and Roots to Harvest
Menu
The Eatery
Garden Grill
Seasonally marinated zucchini, onions and roasted red peppers,
topped with feta and grilled to perfection on two pieces of
Roma Bakery rye bread. Served with side salad topped with
sesame-ginger dressing.
Worth the wait! Seasonally Available
$16.14
Hummus Plate
House made garlic hummus, marinated olives, veggie sticks,
gluten free corn chips and Roma Bakery rye bread makes a
great appetizer!
$9.75
Living Salad
Heritage greens topped with sprouted lentils, baby tomatoes,
fresh avocado & baked tofu dressed with our amazing
sesame-ginger dressing - Served with Roma Bakery rye
bread.
$15.80
Venus Rice Bowl
Organic brown basmati rice, raw shredded beets, carrots and
sprouted roasted tofu (OR chicken) and sprouted lentils
dressed in a delicious house-made tahini sauce.
$14.75
Harvest Salad
Heritage greens topped with sprouted lentils, fresh pear,
roasted chicken, feta cheese & dried cranberries ;
dressed with lemon vinaigrette & drizzled with pesto - Served
with Roma Bakery rye bread.
$15.75
Chipotle Chicken or Tofu Unwrap
Warm naan happy with heritage greens, sprouted lentils,
roasted chicken & tofu, roasted red peppers and sesame
snaps topped with our famous chipotle dressing.
$15.75
Build Your Own Salad
Choose 2 proteins: chicken, tofu, gouda, feta, rice and
hummus.
Choose 3 veggies: sprouts, reds, carrots, beets, celery,
cucumber and pear.
Choose 1 topping: cranberries, pumpkin seeds, sesame
snaps.
Choose a dressing: chipotle, sesame, pesto, lemon
vinaigrette, tahini, greek.
Choose a side: corn chips, Roma Bakery rye bread, Naan
Add more protein for 2.75 extra, add more veggies 1.75 each
and more toppings for 1.75, extra dressing 2.00. Avocado is an
add on for 2.75.
$15.75
Greek Goddess Cous-Cous
Veggie-stock infused cous-cous, fresh baby tomatoes,
cucumbers, feta, hemp and marinated olives served on a bed
of heritage greens dressed with greek dressing and warm
naan.
$15.75
Season Sandwich
Our signature dish, this open faced sandwich is Roma Bakery
rye bread, topped with Thunder Oak Gouda, grilled to
perfection and layered with sliced avocado and our house-
made pesto drizzle and served with side salad topped with
sesame-ginger dressing.
$15.80
$3.00 Side Dishes
grated beets
sprouted lentils
sesame snaps
dried cranberries
pumpkin seeds
baby tomatoes
roasted red peppers
cucumbers
2 oz extra dressing - $3.00
Big Life Plate
Perfect for sharing, the Growing Season's tapas plate.
Fluffy Rice, curried eh. Thunder Oak Gouda, house-made
garlic hummus, marinated olives, veggie sticks, hot! Roma
Bakery rye bread and gluten free corn chips.
$15.25
$4.00 Side Dishes
baked tofu
side chicken
hummus
avocado
Thunder Oak gouda
roasted chicken breast
Other sides
Soup - $8.75
Soup Special - $13.50
The Growing Season Juice Collective Menu - 201 Algoma Street South, Thunder Bay, ON
For personal use only 1
The Drinkery
Teas & Coffee
Tea - Assorted Flavours
$2.50
Locally Roasted Coffee
$2.50
Vital Shakes
16 oz - $9
Big Blue
blueberries, banana, oat milk, whey protein
Growing Season Green
banana, pineapple, oat milk, 'greens!'
Strawberry Fields
strawberries, bananas, oat milk, organic hemp protein
Tropic Thunder
mango, pineapple, banana, oat milk, whey powder
Cocomaniia
strawberry, banana, coconut water, ground flaxseed
The Growing Season Juice Collective Menu - 201 Algoma Street South, Thunder Bay, ON
